publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3083 Iain Gray: The Draft Scotland Act 1998 (Transfer of Functions to the Scottish Ministers etc.) Order 2002-That the Transport and the Environment Committee recommends that the draft Scotland Act 1998 (Transfer of Functions to the Scottish Ministers etc.) Order be approved. Supported by: Lewis Macdonald*

S1M-3083 Iain Gray: The Draft Scotland Act 1998 (Transfer of Functions to the Scottish Ministers etc.) Order 2002-That the Transport and the Environment Committee recommends that the draft Scotland Act 1998 (Transfer of Functions to the Scottish Ministers etc.) Order be approved.
